oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peabody Hotel Exterior in Sepia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Peabody Hotel, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image with sepia tones.

– “Mrs. G.T. Waffard, -- Unaka Ave, -- Johnson City, -- Tenn. -- My dear Mrs. Waffard, -- Of I should write as much -- as I think of you, I would -- write you after I am hav- -- ing a very pleasant time, I am -- working now, selling toilet -- goods I have spent spme time --visiting my blind girl friends. -- With Love & best wishes, -- From, -- Lena”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Peabody Hotel; hotels; downtown;
